<h3 style="margin: 0px 0px 25px 0px; font-variant:small-caps; text-align:center; font-size:2em; letter-spacing:2px">about</h3>

<div class="about">

I am a Senior Principal Data Scientist at Genentech/Roche.
Previously, I was a Lead Data Science Manager at the Prostate Cancer Clinical Trials Consortium, and a Senior Biostatistician at Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center in New York City.
I am an avid R package developer.
My research interests include adaptive methods in clinical trials, precision medicine, predictive modeling, and prostate cancer screening methods.  In my free time, I enjoy baking, going to the beach, and running.
